column1: To investigate the molecular mechanism of the inhibitory effect on transcriptional or post - transcriptional regulation of IL - 6 gene expression by IL - 4 and IL - 10, we studied IL - 6 production, expression level of IL - 6 mRNA, IL - 6 promoter activity, transcriptional activity of NF - kappaB and NF - IL - 6, and IL - 6 mRNA stability in human monocytic cell lines, THP - 1 and U937, stimulated by PMA and LPS in the absence or the presence of IL - 4 or IL - 10.
